General.Name: Zenith Energy Ltd
General.Description: Zenith Energy Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in exploration and development of oil and natural gas in Tunisia, Italy, and the Republic of the Congo. It also engages in the production of oil, gas, and electricity assets in Africa and Europe. The company was formerly known as Canoel International Energy Ltd. and changed its name to Zenith Energy Ltd. in October 2014. Zenith Energy Ltd. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: Bankers Court, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0R8
